channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Whole of Lansdown roed cycle route is full of multiple tree roots and potholes. It is overgrown with poor markings. Dangerous for cyclists and pedestrians. Right of way for cyclists on the cycle path also changes once on lansdown road which is confusing and dangerous., 17th November
item.description:
Whole of Lansdown road cycle path from where green path ends by the railway bridge to Montpellier gardens.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Hatherley Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Drain cover has sunken at Pirton Corner, 16th November
item.description:
The drain / drain cover has sunken at Pirton / Chelt Road corner (Churchdown), closest to the petrol station. There are several drains, but just THIS ONE has dropped, and it's making a very loud rattle. Hopefully that doesn't mean it's about to collapse ?! It's in the left hand side of the main highway so traffic CANNOT avoid it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pirton Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing the blue mini roundabout sign, 16th November
item.description:
The blue mini roundabout sign near the Library on Parton Road (CH/Down), southbound (towards Golden Vale), is missing. Would it be possible to install a replacement please ? TIA !
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 47, Parton Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple blocked drains on Farmfield road, 16th November
item.description:
Multiple storm drains are blocked along Farmfield road which results in a stream running down the road which flows onto the pavement. This has been the case for some time and the rain runs over the top of the drains. The issue is outside no. 150 and stretches down towards Lincoln avenue and up Farmfield road towards Shurdington road with blocked drains in both directions

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 150, Farmfield Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cloddymore Footbridge, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Trees require maintenance, 16th November
item.description:
Trees bordering laxton road and the green lane footpath have not been maintained in many years and have grown very tall with overhanging branches. This poses a risk to parked cars and is blocking sunlight into gardens

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lobleys Drive, Gloucester

item.title: Road marks, 16th November
item.description:
Walnut close the road markings were done by opeanreach the bloke said it will wash away in the rain but it hasn’t been there since September need someone to wash and clean it up with something the road looks awful trying to keep roads clean also there’s a few blocks that are chipped need replacing as there is a lot of traffic going down the road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Walnut Close, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish in the undergrowth, 16th November
item.description:
This rubbish that is collecting in the bushes by the back of the removal company at pilgrove Way opposite the back of all saints academy is just growing week by week. Mainly can and bottles. Not only is it unsightly but its a hazard to wildlife. It's been reported here previously but as usual nothing has been done. Perhaps those serving community service orders from the courts could help the community as part of their sentence by litter picking ?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Pilgrove Way, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes repair failures, 16th November
item.description:
The pot hole nearest the camera was only repaired last week and has already failed within a few days. The pot hole further back was only repaired in the last few weeks and has also failed. Both need to be revisited with the work carried out competently with adequate quality assurance checks. Outside 163 Hewlett Rd

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 163a, Hewlett Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blue mini parked over private drive on double yellows, 16th November
item.description:
Blue mini is parked outside of 5 Fairview Close, over double yellows and blocking the spaces. Only one car can fit on the drive at an angle if the neighbours aren't in.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Fairview Close, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Big pothole causing issues on road, 16th November
item.description:
The pothole I'm reporting is between the first two adjacent houses at the entrance to Orchard Road, Bishops Cleeve. It is 40mm deep, 600mm height and 530mm width. Cars are unable to avoid as to the right of the pothole the road has corroded against the kerb. The whole road has numerous potholes. The pothole has got bigger over around 6 months.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2A, Orchard Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road surface collapse, 16th November
item.description:
Both sides of centre of road collapsed, very dangerous to navigate on a cycle and car sump bottoms out on surface. Complete stretch of road is very hazardous and dangerous to the general public especially cyclists

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
